name: ISKCON Communications Europe
goal:
ISKCON Communications Europe is the advocacy platform for ISKCON Europe. It strives to develop relationships and dialogue with many European Institutions especially the European Parliament, Commission, Council as well as NGO s and Religious Organisations. We follow and are interested in several topics and issues like:
Religious Freedom
Non Discrimination
Environment
Interfaith Dialogue
Social Cohesion
Rights of Women
Rights of Minorities
LGBT issues
etc
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Non Discrimination Guidelines especially connected to Religion and Belief
FoRB
India Delegation
Dialogue with Religious Communities
Civil Liberties
etc
